nodes.text: The droid ion blast Mark I, also known as the "Scrambler", was a weapon designed by Aratech to destroy the electronics of enemy droids by sending a pulse of highly-charged ions. This weapon was marketed toward beings who were faced with the threat of massive droid armies.

The droid ion blast Mark I's only appearance was in Obsidian Entertainment's 2005 video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords. The item requires the Droid Upgrade Class 1 feat to equip, which all droids have.
